EmailTemplate.name: RE: Reactivate my account (1369174425.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Reactivate my account (1369174425.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - - 90 Clean Clean false false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Margo, So good to hear from you and welcome back to MBO! I am so sorry you did not get a response; this was due to an internal miscommunication that resulted in both parties thinking the other was reaching out to you. Again, I truly apologize for this. Here is the good news – I can help you get started up with MBO again! J Please consider me your point of contact and follow the steps below to complete your re-enrollment. - Log in to the MBO site www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCVlBesV44xvOLI63NnDzUNJunttYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> - Click the “Enrollment” link once you are logged in - Confirm contact information - Print out I-9 at the end of the enrollment - You will sign/date section 1 and local notary will sign/date section 2 (most people visit their local bank.) Please email or fax back to MBO (we do not need an original copy.) If you use a US passport as supporting documentation I will need an image of it to comply with E-Verify (most people just take a picture with their phone and then email it to me.) - Send me your clients contact information (name, email, phone number) and I will reach out to get a contract in place. - The link to my private page can be found here <http://info.mbopartners.com/advisor-info-s-conde.html> there are lots of great resources on this page and I encourage you to bookmark it. Please contact me with any questions. Take care,Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCVlBesV44xvOLI63NnDzUNJunttYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCVlBesV44xvOLI63NnDzUNJunttYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCVlBesV44xvOLI63NnDzUNJunttYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Margo Bailey [mailto:margobailey@mac.com] Sent: Tuesday, May 21, 2013 3:31 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Fwd: Reactivate my account Hi Sara, I sent an email to Anne requesting information on how to reactivate my MBO account. I have not received a response, and realized that perhaps she may no longer be at MBO. Can you identify who I should contact for assistance? ThanksMargo Margo Bailey PhDmargobailey@mac.com <mailto:margobailey@mac.com>202-236-3644 Begin forwarded message:From: Margo Bailey <margobailey@mac.com <mailto:margobailey@mac.com>>Subject: Reactivate my accountDate: May 20, 2013 4:49:09 PM EDTTo: Anne Lupardo <alupardo@mbopartners.com <mailto:alupardo@mbopartners.com>> Hi Anne
I would like to re-activate my MBO account. What are my next steps?
Thanks Margo
Margo Bailey PhD margobailey@mac.com <mailto:margobailey@mac.com> 202-236-3644
